title: Man shot in Syracuse; police say it appears he accidentally shot himself
content:
SYRACUSE, N.Y. -- A man shot in the leg Monday night in Syracuse may have accidentally shot himself, police said.
A 21-year-old man walked into Upstate University Hospital at 9:21 p.m. with a gunshot wound to his upper left leg, said Sgt. Richard Helterline, a spokesman for the Syracuse Police Department. The injury is not life-threatening, he said.
Although the man gave officers conflicting stories about how he was injured, Helterline said it appears the man accidentally shot himself.
